item.title: Pimpscape Ipban doesnt work..., Please help thanks CJ
item.dc:creator: @jesse9294 jesse9294
item.description:
@jesse9294 wrote:

There is a long way of banning people by IP’s but it takes a minute or two. Look in their char file and see their IP. Than go to the data file. Look for bannedip’s and paste theirs in it. Than compile the server and they should be banned.

item.title: Pimpscape Ipban doesnt work..., Please help thanks CJ
item.dc:creator: @noob_pwner noob pwner
item.description:
@noob_pwner wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“ipban”)
&& (playerRights >= 3)
&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“CJ”))
{
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];
appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
v.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(“player successfully ip banned”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": HAS IP BANNED THE PLAYER: "+command.substring(5);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
if (bw != null) try {
   bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
   sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
}
  }

} [/code]
try that, also, don’t advert

item.title: Pimpscape Ipban doesnt work..., Please help thanks CJ
item.dc:creator: @cj_howat cj_howat@hotmail.com
item.description:
@cj_howat wrote:

[b]if(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && (playerRights >= 3 ||

playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“CJ”)))
{
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];
appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
v.disconnected = true;
sendMessage(“player successfully ip banned”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": HAS IP BANNED THE PLAYER: "+command.substring(5);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
 }
  }

}

doesnt work, it will ipban them and say
Cj has ipbanned (namehere)
Go into banned ips
but they can create a new acc and logg in myserver, but it wont save and when the logg there acc is banned and they have to make new 1

Any help please and thank you very much

  • :)[shadow=red,left][/shadow]CJ :)[/b]
